description: Six 20-card genre boosters that add specific genre flavor to Story Engine prompts. Each booster contains 4 Agents, 4 Engines, 4 Anchors, 4 Conflicts, and 4 Aspects focused on a particular genre.

gothic.name: Empty Graves & Haunted Halls
gothic.description: Gothic horror elements including haunted locations, supernatural beings, dark atmospheres, and tragic characters.
gothic.contentWarning: Contains themes of death, horror, and the supernatural that may be disturbing to some players.

cues: Wants to torment (or torment someone with)
Wants to destroy the city with
But they will have to face death itself
But it will mean the end of their family line
But their sidekick will lose their greatest power
But they will be haunted by silence
But something horrifying will be set free
But they will have to hang up their hat
But it will turn the city against them

superhero.name: Superpowers & Sidekicks
superhero.description: Superhero action with powered individuals, arch-nemeses, secret identities, and city-saving heroics.

cues: Wants to save the city with/from
Wants to avenge the loss of
Wants to gain a deed to/of
Wants to become the guardian of
Wants to make a weapon of
Wants to protect their land from/with
Wants to put a bullet in
But their sanctum will be destroyed
But it will leave the city unprotected
But they will never get to ride off into the sunset
But it will bring war to their homeworld
But all the riches they have earned will be lost
But one can follow in their footsteps
But their rival will beat them to it
But the enemy leader will escape unscathed

western.name: Outlaws & Gunslingers
western.description: Wild West adventures with cowboys, outlaws, frontier towns, shootouts, and the untamed frontier.
western.sensitivityNote: Created with consultation regarding Indigenous representation. Players should approach Western genre tropes thoughtfully and avoid harmful stereotypes.

cues: Wants to protect their land from/with
Wants to earn a place in/near
Wants to put a bullet in
Wants to win a wager involving
Wants to claim a birthright involving
Wants to reach the magic realm in/with
Wants to find the lost treasure of
But they will have to take a cheap shot
But they will end up dead broke
But their cover will be blown
But their superior will get away with something heinous
But a past atrocity will go unpunished
But bad luck will follow them forever
But their nights will start to pass too slowly
But they will be unable to return to normal life

fairyTale.name: Fairy Trails & Grim Tales
fairyTale.description: Fairy tale adventures with magical creatures, enchanted forests, curses, quests, and transformations.

cues: Wants to seal the magic realm in/with
Wants to reclaim their home from/with
Wants to find their parents with
Wants to join a secret society dedicated to
Wants to break a pact with/involving
Wants to find the lost teachings of
But in a year and a day, it will be reversed
But a temporary change will become permanent
But they will unleash a monster
But it will bring war to their homeworld
But one can follow in their footsteps
But get caught in the crossfire
But trapped in a person of their own making
But all the knowledge they have learned will be lost

pulpFiction.name: Pulp Tales & Penny Dreadfuls
pulpFiction.description: Pulp adventure stories with daring explorers, mad scientists, exotic locales, ancient treasures, and thrilling action.
pulpFiction.sensitivityNote: The pulp genre historically included harmful colonial and racist tropes. Modern players should avoid these elements and focus on adventure while being mindful of representation.

cues: Wants to expose a secret society dedicated to
Wants to reclaim (or reclaim something from)
But their connection to their past will be stripped of their rank
But their connection to magic and whimsy
But a past directly will come to light
But their superior will get away with something heinous
But they will be unable to return to normal life
But a temporary change will become permanent
But there's days will start to pass too quickly
But they will be left a shell of their former self

militarySciFi.name: Dropships & War Hawks
militarySciFi.description: Military sci-fi action with soldiers, space battles, tactical operations, war zones, and futuristic combat.
militarySciFi.sensitivityNote: Explore military themes with critical examination. War affects real people. Consider the human cost and avoid glorifying violence.

cues: Wants to end the occupation of
Wants to succeed at a mission focused on
Wants to install a leader with/of
Wants to sabotage a mission focused on
But operation will get dangerous or get recently
But their cover will be blown
But their superior will get away with something heinous
But a past atrocity will go unpunished
But bad luck will follow them forever
But all the knowledge they have learned will be lost
But they will be unable to return to normal life

usage.description: Six genre-focused 20-card boosters that add specific thematic elements to Story Engine prompts. Each booster can be used independently or mixed with the main Story Engine deck.
integration: Use only one booster - Draw only from a single booster for a genre-focused storytelling session
Mix one booster into main deck - Add one booster to the base Story Engine deck for occasional genre flavor
Freely mix multiple boosters - Combine multiple boosters for genre-blending (gothic superhero, sci-fi western, etc.)
Layer with other expansions - Combine Dreamer boosters with Curio expansions for maximum depth
genreBlending: Gothic + Superhero = Dark superhero stories with horror elements
Western + Fairy Tale = Magical frontier adventures
Pulp Fiction + Military Sci-Fi = Retro-futuristic space adventures
Gothic + Fairy Tale = Dark fairy tales and twisted folklore
Superhero + Military Sci-Fi = Powered soldiers and super-soldier programs
Western + Pulp Fiction = Classic pulp western adventures
